i18n.disclaimer: Please note: translations are provided by the community, and we cannot guarantee their correctness, completeness, or quality
i18n.cta: Do you speak fluent English and want to help us translate? Check out {url}

errors.masterUser: This command is only for the bot owner
errors.serverOwner: You must be the server owner to run this command
errors.musicNoDJ: You're currently not added as a DJ, ask the one that started streaming to add you with `{command}`

common.failedToRun: This command failed to run, if you see my owner please give them this error code: `{errorcode}`
common.softFail: Something went wrong, try again later
common.attachmentNeeded: Please upload an image while using this command
common.notStreaming: I'm not streaming in this server
common.nsfwDisabled: This channel needs to be marked as NSFW before this command can be used
common.cooldown: This command is on cooldown, try again later
common.dmDisabled: This command cannot be used in DMs

ffrw.invalidTime: The time you entered was invalid
ffrw.cantSeekTrack: The track that's currently playing cannot be seeked

skip.queueEmpty: There's nothing to play after this, add something to play after this if you want to skip

volume.outOfRange: Volume must be a number between 0 and 100

dice.badSyntax: Please specify how many dice you want to roll like this: `4d6`, `2d12`

remove.notANumber: Your argument must be a number
remove.done: Removed this song from the playlist

play.cantPlay: I'm unable to play that track: `{message}`
play.cantPlayUnknown: I'm unable to play that track for unknown reasons
play.addFailed: Something went wrong while adding this track, try again later

booru.badFormatting: Your formatting appears to be wrong
booru.siteNotSupported: I don't have support for {site}, currently I support {supported}

errors.notConnected: Please join a voice channel and try this command again
errors.alreadyStreaming: I'm already streaming in this server
errors.cantConnect: I can't connect to the channel you're currently in
errors.failed: Failed to join voice channel, try again?

invite.done: Use the following link to invite me: {invite}
invite.private: This bot is marked as private, please ask {owner} to invite me to your server

errors.noMentions: Please mention who you want to add as a DJ

newdj.done: Added {new, plural, =0 {no new DJs} =1 {one new DJ} other {# new DJs}}, there {total, plural, =0 {are now no DJs} =1 {is now one DJ} other {are now # DJs}}

errors.suffixMissing: You need to type something to encode your message into l337sp3@K

errors.conflict: A tag with that name already exists
errors.illegal: You can't name your tag that
errors.notYours: You don't own that tag, so you can't edit it

tag.owner: The owner of that tag is {user}

queue.title: Current playlist
queue.count: There {songs, plural, =0 {are no songs} =1 {is one song} other {are # songs}} queued
queue.empty: There are currently no songs queued, queue something with `{command}`

kick.noMentions: Please provide IDs or mention users you'd like to kick
kick.noResults: Couldn't find those users in the server

ban.noMentions: Please provide IDs or mention users you'd like to ban
ban.noResults: Couldn't find those users in the server

softban.noMentions: Please provide IDs or mention users you'd like to softban
softban.noResults: Couldn't find those users in the server

purge.notANumber: Your last argument must be a number
purge.tooManyOrFew: You're trying to remove too {num, select, few {few} many {many}} messages
purge.noResults: I was not able to find any messages for purging that are under two weeks old

errors.notFound: This word is so screwed up, even Urban Dictionary doesn't know it

help.header: See <https://wildbeast.guide/commands> for a full list of commands
help.title: Help for command {cmd}

events.trackBroke: The track I'm trying to play broke: `{error}`
events.trackStuck: Seems the track got stuck, automatically skipping it...
events.disconnected: I got disconnected from the voice channel, ending playback
